text: @realDonaldTrump All this talk by the Liar in Chief/Draft Dodger shows that he is to mentally incompetent to deal with the Coronavirus! What kind of idiot seeks kudos when we are dealing with a pandemic.  People are dying for Gods sake. RESIGN, leave Washington. https://t.co/O8PEGzV2cu
